You can store onsite or in one of our secure PODS storage centers. You decide how long you will keep your PODS storage container and when you will need it back.

PODS will retrieve the container and transport it to your new home or back to a local Storage Center until you are ready for your belongings to be delivered to your new home. PODS offers 24-hour service, it takes just one telephone call for re-delivery of the PODS container and your belongings – across town or across the country.

We are the moving company to call for one-stop shopping for all types of moving services for homes, condos, town homes, apartments, & offices. In addition to providing simple traditional moving service for your residence or offices we can provide you with any of the following services: Traditional move, customer packs their own belongings & we move your belongings & furniture from your pick-up address to your drop-off destination. Traditional move with additional stops, customer packs their own belongings & we move your belongings & furniture with additional stops between pick-up & drop-off destinations. For example, if you wish to place some of your belongings or furniture in a storage facility or just have another stop where you need us to pick-up or drop-off some of your items. Pack & move, we pack & move your belongings & furniture from your pick-up address to your drop-off destination. We can provide boxes at a discounted price. We can even unpack your belongins. Pack-Move-Unp ack, we pack, move & unpack your belongings & funiture. Load only, we load your already packed belongings & furniture into your rented moving truck, enclosed trailer, or storage container. Pack & load, we pack & load your belongings & furniture into your rented moving truck, enclosed trailer, or storage container. Unload only, we unload your belongings & furniture from your rented moving truck, enclosed trailer, or storage container.

Remodeling your home and need a place to store your furniture or excess household items?  Putting your home up for sale? A PODS container can provide you with a secure storage option to store extra belongings so you can renovate or stage your home with ease! PODS containers are not only affordable, they are convenient. You can store onsite or in one of our secure PODS storage centers. You decide how long you will keep your PODS storage container and when you will need it back. 
If you are moving, PODS containers are an ideal solution. Delivered right to your door, they are available in three sizes. Since PODS containers sit at ground level, loading and unloading items is convenient too. There are no ramps or steps to navigate. With PODS you can take your time (weeks if needed) and alleviate the stress. Once all of your personal belongings are packed and loaded, provide your own lock on the roll-down door and you keep the key. PODS will retrieve the container and transport it to your new home or back to a local Storage Center until you are ready for your belongings to be delivered to your new home. PODS offers 24-hour service, it takes just one telephone call for re-delivery of the PODS container and your belongings – across town or across the country.

If you are moving, PODS containers are an ideal solution. Delivered right to your door, they are available in three sizes. Since PODS containers sit at ground level, loading and unloading items is convenient too. There are no ramps or steps to navigate. With PODS you can take your time (weeks if needed) and alleviate the stress. Once all of your personal belongings are packed and loaded, provide your own lock on the roll-down door and you keep the key. PODS will retrieve the container and transport it to your new home or back to a local Storage Center until you are ready for your belongings to be delivered to your new home. PODS offers 24-hour service, it takes just one telephone call for re-delivery of the PODS container and your belongings – across town or across the country.

Remodeling your home and need a place to store your furniture or excess household items?  Putting your home up for sale? A PODS container can provide you with a secure storage option to store extra belongings so you can renovate or stage your home with ease! PODS containers are not only affordable, they are convenient. Since PODS containers sit at ground level, loading and unloading items is convenient too. There are no ramps or steps to navigate. With PODS you can take your time (weeks if needed) and alleviate the stress. Once all of your personal belongings are packed and loaded, provide your own lock on the roll-down door and you keep the key. PODS will retrieve the container and transport it to your new home or back to a local Storage Center until you are ready for your belongings to be delivered to your new home. PODS offers 24-hour service, it takes just one telephone call for re-delivery of the PODS container and your belongings – across town or across the country.

Remodeling your home and need a place to store your furniture or excess household items?  Putting your home up for sale? A PODS container can provide you with a secure storage option to store extra belongings so you can renovate or stage your home with ease! PODS containers are not only affordable, they are convenient. You can store onsite or in one of our secure PODS storage centers. You decide how long you will keep your PODS storage container and when you will need it back. 
If you are moving, PODS containers are an ideal solution. Delivered right to your door, they are available in three sizes. Since PODS containers sit at ground level, loading and unloading items is convenient too. There are no ramps or steps to navigate. With PODS you can take your time (weeks if needed) and alleviate the stress. Once all of your personal belongings are packed and loaded, provide your own lock on the roll-down door and you keep the key. PODS will retrieve the container and transport it to your new home or back to a local Storage Center until you are ready for your belongings to be delivered to your new home. PODS offers 24-hour service, it takes just one telephone call for re-delivery of the PODS container and your belongings – across town or across the country.

OUR competitors will tack on "hidden fees" disguised AS service charges. Fuel surcharges. Delivery fees. Special handling of high value or heavy item charges. You can store onsite or in one of our secure PODS storage centers. You decide how long you will keep your PODS storage container and when you will need it back. 
If you are moving, PODS containers are an ideal solution. Delivered right to your door, they are available in three sizes. Since PODS containers sit at ground level, loading and unloading items is convenient too. There are no ramps or steps to navigate. With PODS you can take your time (weeks if needed) and alleviate the stress. Once all of your personal belongings are packed and loaded, provide your own lock on the roll-down door and you keep the key. PODS will retrieve the container and transport it to your new home or back to a local Storage Center until you are ready for your belongings to be delivered to your new home. PODS offers 24-hour service, it takes just one telephone call for re-delivery of the PODS container and your belongings – across town or across the country.

We encourage YOU to "ASK around" before making a moving DECISION. ONCE YOU Begin asking the right questions. Then YOU will quickly SEE HOW we quietly became the oldest and most respected moving team in birmingham and the entire southeast by winning over ONE Family AT a TIME. TRANSPARENT billing practices = we DO NOT charge extra for anything!  
 
 
YOU won't find ANY surprises on your final bill which sadly has become a standard within OUR industry. OUR quoted hourly rate is exactly what YOU will END UP paying AT the END of your local MOVE. (TOTAL time X hourly rate = final invoice)   
 
 
OUR competitors will tack on "hidden fees" disguised AS service charges. Fuel surcharges. Delivery fees. Special handling of high value or heavy item charges. "PER step" charges for multilevel houses and apartments and a multitude of other things that we deem unnecessary. Transparency and uniqueness: 
 
 
we disassembled and reassembled ALL Beds and cribs on the DAY of your move. ALL mirrors. Marble tops and glass shelves are removed and carefully wrapped by US on the DAY of your move. YOU'LL find most other moving companies require YOU to USE a THIRD-PARTY Company to crate these items which is more money OUT of your POCKET. ALL appliances are disconnected and reconnected by US on the DAY of your move with a simply release of liability. Again, a large majority of other moving companies will require YOU to utilize a third party to disconnect large appliances (washer. Dryer. Refrigerator). We DO NOT charge extra for pianos. Organs or fine antiques. In fact. Ellis piano in Hoover has been recommending OUR services since 1983 when we saved the DAY for David on a 4TH floor and highly complex grand piano DELIVERY. OUR team trained directly with Steinway & sons and we are the only recommended piano mover by their organization in north & central Alabama. UAB. Samford. Birmingham southern and Montevallo ALL utilize US when needing a piano moved. What we SAY is what YOU GET! we tend to ASK a FEW more questions from OUR customers because every move requires a different approach. But by getting to know OUR customers and fostering relationships. We know that YOU will END UP becoming a customer for life.

Our company is based on the belief that our customers needs are of the utmost importance. Our entire team is committed to meeting those needs. As a result, a high percentage of our business is from repeat customers and referrals. We have had over Five years experience in moving! We have moved restaurants, offices, homes, and storm victims! We not only move in the Birmingham area, but we also cover all of Alabama! We move anywhere anytime! We do instate moves as well as out of state moves and we are dedicated to brining a great moving experience to every state in the USA! Not only do we offer amazing service with dedicated movers, but we offer the lowest rates starting at just $75.00 an hour! So pick up your phones! Remodeling your home and need a place to store your furniture or excess household items?  Putting your home up for sale? A PODS container can provide you with a secure storage option to store extra belongings so you can renovate or stage your home with ease! PODS containers are not only affordable, they are convenient. You can store onsite or in one of our secure PODS storage centers. You decide how long you will keep your PODS storage container and when you will need it back. 
If you are moving, PODS containers are an ideal solution. Delivered right to your door, they are available in three sizes. Since PODS containers sit at ground level, loading and unloading items is convenient too. There are no ramps or steps to navigate. With PODS you can take your time (weeks if needed) and alleviate the stress. Once all of your personal belongings are packed and loaded, provide your own lock on the roll-down door and you keep the key. PODS will retrieve the container and transport it to your new home or back to a local Storage Center until you are ready for your belongings to be delivered to your new home. PODS offers 24-hour service, it takes just one telephone call for re-delivery of the PODS container and your belongings – across town or across the country.

We encourage YOU to "ASK around" before making a moving DECISION. ONCE YOU Begin asking the right questions. Then YOU will quickly SEE HOW we quietly became the oldest and most respected moving team in birmingham and the entire southeast by winning over ONE Family AT a TIME. TRANSPARENT billing practices = we DO NOT charge extra for anything!  
 
 
YOU won't find ANY surprises on your final bill which sadly has become a standard within OUR industry. OUR quoted hourly rate is exactly what YOU will END UP paying AT the END of your local MOVE. (TOTAL time X hourly rate = final invoice)   
 
 
OUR competitors will tack on "hidden fees" disguised AS service charges. Fuel surcharges. Delivery fees. Special handling of high value or heavy item charges. "PER step" charges for multilevel houses and apartments and a multitude of other things that we deem unnecessary. Transparency and uniqueness: 
 
 
we disassembled and reassembled ALL Beds and cribs on the DAY of your move. ALL mirrors. Marble tops and glass shelves are removed and carefully wrapped by US on the DAY of your move. ALL appliances are disconnected and reconnected by US on the DAY of your move with a simply release of liability. Organs or fine antiques. In fact. Ellis piano in Hoover has been recommending OUR services since 1983 when we saved the DAY for David on a 4TH floor and highly complex grand piano DELIVERY. OUR team trained directly with Steinway & sons and we are the only recommended piano mover by their organization in north & central Alabama. UAB. Samford. Birmingham southern and Montevallo ALL utilize US when needing a piano moved. What we SAY is what YOU GET! we tend to ASK a FEW more questions from OUR customers because every move requires a different approach. But by getting to know OUR customers and fostering relationships. We know that YOU will END UP becoming a customer for life.

We encourage YOU to "ASK around" before making a moving DECISION. ONCE YOU Begin asking the right questions. Then YOU will quickly SEE HOW we quietly became the oldest and most respected moving team in birmingham and the entire southeast by winning over ONE Family AT a TIME. TRANSPARENT billing practices = we DO NOT charge extra for anything!  
 
 
YOU won't find ANY surprises on your final bill which sadly has become a standard within OUR industry. OUR quoted hourly rate is exactly what YOU will END UP paying AT the END of your local MOVE. (TOTAL time X hourly rate = final invoice)   
 
 
OUR competitors will tack on "hidden fees" disguised AS service charges. Fuel surcharges. Delivery fees. Special handling of high value or heavy item charges. "PER step" charges for multilevel houses and apartments and a multitude of other things that we deem unnecessary. Transparency and uniqueness: 
 
 
we disassembled and reassembled ALL Beds and cribs on the DAY of your move. ALL mirrors. Marble tops and glass shelves are removed and carefully wrapped by US on the DAY of your move. ALL appliances are disconnected and reconnected by US on the DAY of your move with a simply release of liability. Again, a large majority of other moving companies will require YOU to utilize a third party to disconnect large appliances (washer. Dryer. Refrigerator). We DO NOT charge extra for pianos. Organs or fine antiques. In fact. Ellis piano in Hoover has been recommending OUR services since 1983 when we saved the DAY for David on a 4TH floor and highly complex grand piano DELIVERY. OUR team trained directly with Steinway & sons and we are the only recommended piano mover by their organization in north & central Alabama. UAB. Samford. Birmingham southern and Montevallo ALL utilize US when needing a piano moved. We know that YOU will END UP becoming a customer for life.

Pack-Move-Unp ack, we pack, move & unpack your belongings & funiture. Load only, we load your already packed belongings & furniture into your rented moving truck, enclosed trailer, or storage container. Pack & load, we pack & load your belongings & furniture into your rented moving truck, enclosed trailer, or storage container. Unload only, we unload your belongings & furniture from your rented moving truck, enclosed trailer, or storage container.

Remodeling your home and need a place to store your furniture or excess household items?  Putting your home up for sale? A PODS container can provide you with a secure storage option to store extra belongings so you can renovate or stage your home with ease! PODS containers are not only affordable, they are convenient. You can store onsite or in one of our secure PODS storage centers. You decide how long you will keep your PODS storage container and when you will need it back. 
If you are moving, PODS containers are an ideal solution. Delivered right to your door, they are available in three sizes. Since PODS containers sit at ground level, loading and unloading items is convenient too. There are no ramps or steps to navigate. With PODS you can take your time (weeks if needed) and alleviate the stress. Once all of your personal belongings are packed and loaded, provide your own lock on the roll-down door and you keep the key. PODS will retrieve the container and transport it to your new home or back to a local Storage Center until you are ready for your belongings to be delivered to your new home. PODS offers 24-hour service, it takes just one telephone call for re-delivery of the PODS container and your belongings – across town or across the country.

We encourage YOU to "ASK around" before making a moving DECISION. ONCE YOU Begin asking the right questions. Then YOU will quickly SEE HOW we quietly became the oldest and most respected moving team in birmingham and the entire southeast by winning over ONE Family AT a TIME. TRANSPARENT billing practices = we DO NOT charge extra for anything!  
 
 
YOU won't find ANY surprises on your final bill which sadly has become a standard within OUR industry. OUR quoted hourly rate is exactly what YOU will END UP paying AT the END of your local MOVE. (TOTAL time X hourly rate = final invoice)   
 
 
OUR competitors will tack on "hidden fees" disguised AS service charges. Fuel surcharges. Delivery fees. Special handling of high value or heavy item charges. "PER step" charges for multilevel houses and apartments and a multitude of other things that we deem unnecessary. Transparency and uniqueness: 
 
 
we disassembled and reassembled ALL Beds and cribs on the DAY of your move. ALL mirrors. Marble tops and glass shelves are removed and carefully wrapped by US on the DAY of your move. ALL appliances are disconnected and reconnected by US on the DAY of your move with a simply release of liability. Again, a large majority of other moving companies will require YOU to utilize a third party to disconnect large appliances (washer. Dryer. Refrigerator). We DO NOT charge extra for pianos. Organs or fine antiques. In fact. Ellis piano in Hoover has been recommending OUR services since 1983 when we saved the DAY for David on a 4TH floor and highly complex grand piano DELIVERY. OUR team trained directly with Steinway & sons and we are the only recommended piano mover by their organization in north & central Alabama. UAB. Samford. Birmingham southern and Montevallo ALL utilize US when needing a piano moved. What we SAY is what YOU GET! we tend to ASK a FEW more questions from OUR customers because every move requires a different approach. But by getting to know OUR customers and fostering relationships. We know that YOU will END UP becoming a customer for life.

If you are moving, PODS containers are an ideal solution. Delivered right to your door, they are available in three sizes. Since PODS containers sit at ground level, loading and unloading items is convenient too. There are no ramps or steps to navigate. Once all of your personal belongings are packed and loaded, provide your own lock on the roll-down door and you keep the key. PODS will retrieve the container and transport it to your new home or back to a local Storage Center until you are ready for your belongings to be delivered to your new home. PODS offers 24-hour service, it takes just one telephone call for re-delivery of the PODS container and your belongings – across town or across the country.

TRANSPARENT billing practices = we DO NOT charge extra for anything!  
 
 
YOU won't find ANY surprises on your final bill which sadly has become a standard within OUR industry. OUR quoted hourly rate is exactly what YOU will END UP paying AT the END of your local MOVE. (TOTAL time X hourly rate = final invoice)   
 
 
OUR competitors will tack on "hidden fees" disguised AS service charges. Fuel surcharges. Delivery fees. Special handling of high value or heavy item charges. "PER step" charges for multilevel houses and apartments and a multitude of other things that we deem unnecessary. Transparency and uniqueness: 
 
 
we disassembled and reassembled ALL Beds and cribs on the DAY of your move. ALL mirrors. Marble tops and glass shelves are removed and carefully wrapped by US on the DAY of your move. ALL appliances are disconnected and reconnected by US on the DAY of your move with a simply release of liability. Organs or fine antiques. In fact. Ellis piano in Hoover has been recommending OUR services since 1983 when we saved the DAY for David on a 4TH floor and highly complex grand piano DELIVERY. Load only, we load your already packed belongings & furniture into your rented moving truck, enclosed trailer, or storage container. Pack & load, we pack & load your belongings & furniture into your rented moving truck, enclosed trailer, or storage container. Unload only, we unload your belongings & furniture from your rented moving truck, enclosed trailer, or storage container.

Remodeling your home and need a place to store your furniture or excess household items?  Putting your home up for sale? A PODS container can provide you with a secure storage option to store extra belongings so you can renovate or stage your home with ease! PODS containers are not only affordable, they are convenient. You can store onsite or in one of our secure PODS storage centers. You decide how long you will keep your PODS storage container and when you will need it back. 
If you are moving, PODS containers are an ideal solution. Delivered right to your door, they are available in three sizes. Since PODS containers sit at ground level, loading and unloading items is convenient too. There are no ramps or steps to navigate. With PODS you can take your time (weeks if needed) and alleviate the stress. Once all of your personal belongings are packed and loaded, provide your own lock on the roll-down door and you keep the key. PODS will retrieve the container and transport it to your new home or back to a local Storage Center until you are ready for your belongings to be delivered to your new home. PODS offers 24-hour service, it takes just one telephone call for re-delivery of the PODS container and your belongings – across town or across the country.

We encourage YOU to "ASK around" before making a moving DECISION. ONCE YOU Begin asking the right questions. Then YOU will quickly SEE HOW we quietly became the oldest and most respected moving team in birmingham and the entire southeast by winning over ONE Family AT a TIME. TRANSPARENT billing practices = we DO NOT charge extra for anything!  
 
 
YOU won't find ANY surprises on your final bill which sadly has become a standard within OUR industry. OUR quoted hourly rate is exactly what YOU will END UP paying AT the END of your local MOVE. (TOTAL time X hourly rate = final invoice)   
 
 
OUR competitors will tack on "hidden fees" disguised AS service charges. Fuel surcharges. Delivery fees. Special handling of high value or heavy item charges. "PER step" charges for multilevel houses and apartments and a multitude of other things that we deem unnecessary. Transparency and uniqueness: 
 
 
we disassembled and reassembled ALL Beds and cribs on the DAY of your move. ALL mirrors. Marble tops and glass shelves are removed and carefully wrapped by US on the DAY of your move. YOU'LL find most other moving companies require YOU to USE a THIRD-PARTY Company to crate these items which is more money OUT of your POCKET. ALL appliances are disconnected and reconnected by US on the DAY of your move with a simply release of liability. Again, a large majority of other moving companies will require YOU to utilize a third party to disconnect large appliances (washer. Dryer. Refrigerator). We DO NOT charge extra for pianos. Organs or fine antiques. In fact. Ellis piano in Hoover has been recommending OUR services since 1983 when we saved the DAY for David on a 4TH floor and highly complex grand piano DELIVERY. OUR team trained directly with Steinway & sons and we are the only recommended piano mover by their organization in north & central Alabama. UAB. Samford. Birmingham southern and Montevallo ALL utilize US when needing a piano moved. What we SAY is what YOU GET! we tend to ASK a FEW more questions from OUR customers because every move requires a different approach. But by getting to know OUR customers and fostering relationships. We know that YOU will END UP becoming a customer for life.

Pack-Move-Unp ack, we pack, move & unpack your belongings & funiture. Load only, we load your already packed belongings & furniture into your rented moving truck, enclosed trailer, or storage container. Pack & load, we pack & load your belongings & furniture into your rented moving truck, enclosed trailer, or storage container. Unload only, we unload your belongings & furniture from your rented moving truck, enclosed trailer, or storage container.

Remodeling your home and need a place to store your furniture or excess household items?  Putting your home up for sale? A PODS container can provide you with a secure storage option to store extra belongings so you can renovate or stage your home with ease! PODS containers are not only affordable, they are convenient. You can store onsite or in one of our secure PODS storage centers. You decide how long you will keep your PODS storage container and when you will need it back. 
If you are moving, PODS containers are an ideal solution. Delivered right to your door, they are available in three sizes. Since PODS containers sit at ground level, loading and unloading items is convenient too. There are no ramps or steps to navigate. With PODS you can take your time (weeks if needed) and alleviate the stress. Once all of your personal belongings are packed and loaded, provide your own lock on the roll-down door and you keep the key. PODS will retrieve the container and transport it to your new home or back to a local Storage Center until you are ready for your belongings to be delivered to your new home. PODS offers 24-hour service, it takes just one telephone call for re-delivery of the PODS container and your belongings – across town or across the country.

We encourage YOU to "ASK around" before making a moving DECISION. ONCE YOU Begin asking the right questions. Then YOU will quickly SEE HOW we quietly became the oldest and most respected moving team in birmingham and the entire southeast by winning over ONE Family AT a TIME. TRANSPARENT billing practices = we DO NOT charge extra for anything!  
 
 
YOU won't find ANY surprises on your final bill which sadly has become a standard within OUR industry. OUR quoted hourly rate is exactly what YOU will END UP paying AT the END of your local MOVE. (TOTAL time X hourly rate = final invoice)   
 
 
OUR competitors will tack on "hidden fees" disguised AS service charges. Fuel surcharges. Delivery fees. Special handling of high value or heavy item charges. "PER step" charges for multilevel houses and apartments and a multitude of other things that we deem unnecessary. Transparency and uniqueness: 
 
 
we disassembled and reassembled ALL Beds and cribs on the DAY of your move. ALL mirrors. Marble tops and glass shelves are removed and carefully wrapped by US on the DAY of your move. YOU'LL find most other moving companies require YOU to USE a THIRD-PARTY Company to crate these items which is more money OUT of your POCKET. ALL appliances are disconnected and reconnected by US on the DAY of your move with a simply release of liability. Again, a large majority of other moving companies will require YOU to utilize a third party to disconnect large appliances (washer. Dryer. Refrigerator). We DO NOT charge extra for pianos. Organs or fine antiques. In fact. Ellis piano in Hoover has been recommending OUR services since 1983 when we saved the DAY for David on a 4TH floor and highly complex grand piano DELIVERY. OUR team trained directly with Steinway & sons and we are the only recommended piano mover by their organization in north & central Alabama. UAB. Samford. Birmingham southern and Montevallo ALL utilize US when needing a piano moved. What we SAY is what YOU GET! we tend to ASK a FEW more questions from OUR customers because every move requires a different approach. But by getting to know OUR customers and fostering relationships. We know that YOU will END UP becoming a customer for life.

Remodeling your home and need a place to store your furniture or excess household items?  Putting your home up for sale? A PODS container can provide you with a secure storage option to store extra belongings so you can renovate or stage your home with ease! PODS containers are not only affordable, they are convenient. You can store onsite or in one of our secure PODS storage centers. You decide how long you will keep your PODS storage container and when you will need it back. 
If you are moving, PODS containers are an ideal solution. Delivered right to your door, they are available in three sizes. Since PODS containers sit at ground level, loading and unloading items is convenient too. There are no ramps or steps to navigate. With PODS you can take your time (weeks if needed) and alleviate the stress. Once all of your personal belongings are packed and loaded, provide your own lock on the roll-down door and you keep the key. PODS will retrieve the container and transport it to your new home or back to a local Storage Center until you are ready for your belongings to be delivered to your new home. PODS offers 24-hour service, it takes just one telephone call for re-delivery of the PODS container and your belongings – across town or across the country.

We encourage YOU to "ASK around" before making a moving DECISION. ONCE YOU Begin asking the right questions. Then YOU will quickly SEE HOW we quietly became the oldest and most respected moving team in birmingham and the entire southeast by winning over ONE Family AT a TIME. TRANSPARENT billing practices = we DO NOT charge extra for anything!  
 
 
YOU won't find ANY surprises on your final bill which sadly has become a standard within OUR industry. OUR quoted hourly rate is exactly what YOU will END UP paying AT the END of your local MOVE. (TOTAL time X hourly rate = final invoice)   
 
 
OUR competitors will tack on "hidden fees" disguised AS service charges. Fuel surcharges. Delivery fees. Special handling of high value or heavy item charges. "PER step" charges for multilevel houses and apartments and a multitude of other things that we deem unnecessary. Transparency and uniqueness: 
 
 
we disassembled and reassembled ALL Beds and cribs on the DAY of your move. ALL mirrors. Marble tops and glass shelves are removed and carefully wrapped by US on the DAY of your move. YOU'LL find most other moving companies require YOU to USE a THIRD-PARTY Company to crate these items which is more money OUT of your POCKET. ALL appliances are disconnected and reconnected by US on the DAY of your move with a simply release of liability. Again, a large majority of other moving companies will require YOU to utilize a third party to disconnect large appliances (washer. Dryer. Refrigerator). We DO NOT charge extra for pianos. Organs or fine antiques. In fact. Ellis piano in Hoover has been recommending OUR services since 1983 when we saved the DAY for David on a 4TH floor and highly complex grand piano DELIVERY. OUR team trained directly with Steinway & sons and we are the only recommended piano mover by their organization in north & central Alabama. UAB. Samford. Birmingham southern and Montevallo ALL utilize US when needing a piano moved. What we SAY is what YOU GET! we tend to ASK a FEW more questions from OUR customers because every move requires a different approach. But by getting to know OUR customers and fostering relationships. We know that YOU will END UP becoming a customer for life.

You can store onsite or in one of our secure PODS storage centers. You decide how long you will keep your PODS storage container and when you will need it back. 
If you are moving, PODS containers are an ideal solution. Delivered right to your door, they are available in three sizes. Since PODS containers sit at ground level, loading and unloading items is convenient too. There are no ramps or steps to navigate. With PODS you can take your time (weeks if needed) and alleviate the stress. Once all of your personal belongings are packed and loaded, provide your own lock on the roll-down door and you keep the key. PODS will retrieve the container and transport it to your new home or back to a local Storage Center until you are ready for your belongings to be delivered to your new home. PODS offers 24-hour service, it takes just one telephone call for re-delivery of the PODS container and your belongings – across town or across the country.

TRANSPARENT billing practices = we DO NOT charge extra for anything!  
 
 
YOU won't find ANY surprises on your final bill which sadly has become a standard within OUR industry. OUR quoted hourly rate is exactly what YOU will END UP paying AT the END of your local MOVE. (TOTAL time X hourly rate = final invoice)   
 
 
OUR competitors will tack on "hidden fees" disguised AS service charges. Fuel surcharges. Delivery fees. Special handling of high value or heavy item charges. "PER step" charges for multilevel houses and apartments and a multitude of other things that we deem unnecessary. Transparency and uniqueness: 
 
 
we disassembled and reassembled ALL Beds and cribs on the DAY of your move. ALL mirrors. Marble tops and glass shelves are removed and carefully wrapped by US on the DAY of your move. ALL appliances are disconnected and reconnected by US on the DAY of your move with a simply release of liability. Organs or fine antiques. In fact. Ellis piano in Hoover has been recommending OUR services since 1983 when we saved the DAY for David on a 4TH floor and highly complex grand piano DELIVERY. Remodeling your home and need a place to store your furniture or excess household items?  Putting your home up for sale? A PODS container can provide you with a secure storage option to store extra belongings so you can renovate or stage your home with ease! PODS containers are not only affordable, they are convenient. You can store onsite or in one of our secure PODS storage centers. You decide how long you will keep your PODS storage container and when you will need it back. 
If you are moving, PODS containers are an ideal solution. Delivered right to your door, they are available in three sizes. Since PODS containers sit at ground level, loading and unloading items is convenient too. There are no ramps or steps to navigate. With PODS you can take your time (weeks if needed) and alleviate the stress. Once all of your personal belongings are packed and loaded, provide your own lock on the roll-down door and you keep the key. PODS will retrieve the container and transport it to your new home or back to a local Storage Center until you are ready for your belongings to be delivered to your new home. PODS offers 24-hour service, it takes just one telephone call for re-delivery of the PODS container and your belongings – across town or across the country.

We encourage YOU to "ASK around" before making a moving DECISION. ONCE YOU Begin asking the right questions. Then YOU will quickly SEE HOW we quietly became the oldest and most respected moving team in birmingham and the entire southeast by winning over ONE Family AT a TIME. TRANSPARENT billing practices = we DO NOT charge extra for anything!  
 
 
YOU won't find ANY surprises on your final bill which sadly has become a standard within OUR industry. OUR quoted hourly rate is exactly what YOU will END UP paying AT the END of your local MOVE. (TOTAL time X hourly rate = final invoice)   
 
 
OUR competitors will tack on "hidden fees" disguised AS service charges. Fuel surcharges. Delivery fees. Special handling of high value or heavy item charges. "PER step" charges for multilevel houses and apartments and a multitude of other things that we deem unnecessary. Transparency and uniqueness: 
 
 
we disassembled and reassembled ALL Beds and cribs on the DAY of your move. ALL mirrors. Marble tops and glass shelves are removed and carefully wrapped by US on the DAY of your move. YOU'LL find most other moving companies require YOU to USE a THIRD-PARTY Company to crate these items which is more money OUT of your POCKET. ALL appliances are disconnected and reconnected by US on the DAY of your move with a simply release of liability. Again, a large majority of other moving companies will require YOU to utilize a third party to disconnect large appliances (washer. Dryer. Refrigerator). We DO NOT charge extra for pianos. Organs or fine antiques. In fact. Ellis piano in Hoover has been recommending OUR services since 1983 when we saved the DAY for David on a 4TH floor and highly complex grand piano DELIVERY. OUR team trained directly with Steinway & sons and we are the only recommended piano mover by their organization in north & central Alabama. UAB. Samford. Birmingham southern and Montevallo ALL utilize US when needing a piano moved. What we SAY is what YOU GET! we tend to ASK a FEW more questions from OUR customers because every move requires a different approach. But by getting to know OUR customers and fostering relationships. We know that YOU will END UP becoming a customer for life.

Our company is based on the belief that our customers needs are of the utmost importance. Our entire team is committed to meeting those needs. As a result, a high percentage of our business is from repeat customers and referrals. We have had over Five years experience in moving! We have moved restaurants, offices, homes, and storm victims! We at Global Moving enjoy being a part of your new start, which is why we will go as far as we can and do as much as needed to satisfy our customers! We not only move in the Birmingham area, but we also cover all of Alabama! We move anywhere anytime! We do instate moves as well as out of state moves and we are dedicated to brining a great moving experience to every state in the USA! Not only do we offer amazing service with dedicated movers, but we offer the lowest rates starting at just $75.00 an hour! So pick up your phones! Make that the decision today to start a new life, in a new home, with an experienced moving crew dedicated to your satisfaction! We hope you can find everything you need. Global Moving is focused on providing high-quality service and customer satisfaction we will do everything we can to meet your expectations.
